string.name: Desc
string.value: It's a place where, armed with Cash, you'll be able to purchase accessories, clothes, messenger item, hair salon coupons, coupons for plastic surgery, and other various items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that allows the character to see the items it owns.\nThe items are categorized under Equip., Use, Set-Up, and Etc. items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the equipped items, and allowing the character to equip/unequip them.\nOpen the item inventory alongside it to use the equip. items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows detailed character info and its abilities.\nUse AP to enhance many different kinds of abilities.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the detailed look of the skillbook owned by the character.\nUse skill points to learn the skills available.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you chat with buddies within a world.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you change the options or game infos.\nCan change game and system option.\nCan also see quest info, party info, and the community info.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Press the button to choose the character you want to whisper to.\nPress it once more to disable whisper.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Registers the map the character is at to the teleport list. Can save up to 5 maps.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Registers the map where the character is located into the Teleport List. Can register upto 10 different places.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Delete the chosen map from the list.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Teleports to the map of your choice, or to the map where the chosen character is.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Click on Quest Alarm button if you wish to register the current quest into the Quest Alarm. Up to 5 quests can be registered in this alarm.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to your level and class.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to Brawler requirements.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to Gunslinger requirements.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Once the name is made,\nthe name can't be changed.

string.name: Desc
string.value:
Can make the job advancement to Warrior, Bowman, Thief, Magician, or Pirate. 
Warrior : Minimum of Level 10, Perion
Bowman : Minimum of Level 10, Henesys
Magician : Minimum of Level 8, Ellinia
Thief : Minimum of Level 10, Kerning City
Pirate : Minimum of Level 10, The Nautilus

string.name: Desc
string.value: Accumulate enough EXP to raise the level of the character.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The main community of the communities the account belongs to. Press "G" to check guild info.

string.name: Desc
string.value: It's a health stat, and if it reaches 0, the character dies.\nHP decreases if either attacked by an enemy or if a certain skill is used.\nIt can go up to the maximum of 30,000 points.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat needed to use various skills.\nIt can go up to the maximum of 30,000 points.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The amount of experience gained. \nObtained by killing a monster or completing a quest.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The level of fame can be increased or decreased, based on other users. Some equipments and quests require the character reach a certain level of fame.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat needed to use heavy weapons and/or armors.\nIt determines the attacking ability of the warriors and pirates (Brawlers).

string.name: Desc
string.value: This stat is vital to making direct attacks using a weapon. This is the most significant stat when it comes to the strength of the attacks for warriors and pirates (Gunslingers).

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher this stat, the higher the accuracy and strenghth of your magic attack. The most important stat that determines the magic attacks for mages.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher it is, the higher the avoidability is. \nIt determines the Thief's attacking ability and the Mage's magic attack accuracy. \nAlso, the higher it is, the less EXP a character loses by dying.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Amount to increase STR, DEX, INT,LUK, HP and MP. For STR, DEX, INT and LUK, every 1 AP used will increase the stats by 1. For HP and MP, it differs pending on the jobs and characters. 5 Points will be given upon level up.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that impacts the damage caused by physical attacks. This stat is related to strength (STR) for warriors and magicians, dexterity (DEX) for bowmen, strength, dexterity and luck (LUK) for thieves and strength and dexterity for pirates. The above stat and the equipment's physical attack are added to decide on the overall physical attack.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the ability to defend the weapon attack.\nBased on all equipped armors' weapon def.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the success rate and the attacking ability of spells.\nBased on INT and equipped items' magic power.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat for defending spells.\nBased on magic def. of every armor that's been equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the accuracy of weapon attack. \nThe higher, the more accurate.\nBased on dexterity and the equipment item options.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that enables the character to avoid weapon damage.\nThe higher it is, the better the character avoids weapon damage.\nBased on dexterity, luck, and the equipment item options.

string.name: Desc
string.value: A character's speed can increase upto 140%. Can be changed through equipment item options or skills.

string.name: Desc
string.value: A character's jump ability can increase upto 123%. \nCan be changed through equipment item options or skills.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Press Alt on keyboard to jump

string.name: Desc
string.value: Move around, climb up the ladder, and use portals using the arrow keys.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Move to the right to explore new grounds.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase armors.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Fee : 150 Mesos\n\nGet on the ship that heads to Lith Harbor through Shanks. Once out of Maple Island, you will not be able to return here ever again.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase weapons.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase potions, scrolls, and other goods.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The ship that passes through Ereve is at anchor.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Danger zone from here on. Be cautious.

string.name: Desc
string.value:
Perion, Ellinia: 1200 Mesos, Henesys: 800 Mesos, Kerning City: 1000 Mesos


- 90% Discount for Beginners!!

string.name: Desc
string.value: A small altar setup by the hunters in El Nath. This was made to appease the Snow Witch when she appears enraged. If a dropped item from the snowfield is used as the sacrifice, then the witch will be appeased.

string.name: Title
string.value: Watch Out for the Bamboo Warrior!

string.name: Desc
string.value: If a cold breeze blows through the Bamboo Forest, that's when Bamboo Warrior appears! Watch out for the Bamboo Warrior that's holding a grudge. To eliminate the warrior, slash the bamboo trees in the Forest...
